entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Falls 1:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Showers over southern sections late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 11:48 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Showers over southern sections early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:48 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:48 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
